mapper.select: select mailboxaskid,title from mailboxask WHERE flag=2 order by readcount desc limit 0,5
mapper.update: update mailboxask set readcount = readcount+1 where mailboxaskid = #{mailboxaskid}
mapper.select: select a.mailboxaskid,askname,title,a.context,c.mailboxtypename,asktime,readcount,b.replytime from mailboxask a left join (select d.mailboxaskid,replytime from mailboxreply d) b on a.mailboxaskid=b.mailboxaskid left join (select mailboxtypename,mailboxtypeid from mailboxtype) c on a.mailboxtype=c.mailboxtypeid where a.flag = 2 order by b.replytime desc,readcount desc,asktime desc
mapper.update: update mailboxreply set satisfied = #{satisfied} where mailboxreplyid = #{mailboxreplyid}
mapper.select: select mailboxtypeid,mailboxtypename from mailboxtype where mailboxtypeflag = 1
select mailboxtypename from mailboxtype where mailboxtypeid=#{mailboxtypeid}

select a.mailboxaskid,askname,title,a.context,c.mailboxtypename,asktime,readcount,b.replytime from mailboxask a left join (select d.mailboxaskid,replytime from mailboxreply d) b on a.mailboxaskid=b.mailboxaskid left join (select mailboxtypename,mailboxtypeid from mailboxtype) c on a.mailboxtype=c.mailboxtypeid where a.flag = 2 and (title like '%${_parameter}%' or context like '%${_parameter}%') order by b.replytime desc,readcount desc,asktime desc
select mailboxaskid,askname,title,context,mailboxtype,asktime,readcount,flag from mailboxask where mailboxtype = #{mailboxType} and flag = #{flag} order by asktime desc
